title: Share of people owning microwave ovens in Germany 2008 to 2017
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Share of respondents. In total the number of data points it has is 5.
Overall Share of respondents has decreased over the Year.
Share of respondents is roughly constant from 2008 to 2010, and lastly slightly decreasing from 2010 to 2017.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2013 and 2015.
The highest Share of respondents, of value 80.0 was reached at Year 2008, and 2010
The lowest Share of respondents, of value 65.0 was reported at Year 2017
